description: Erection of two additional storeys to create a third and fourth floor incorporating the installation of PV panels on the roof.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: Drawings 230065-PL-D 0001(Rev.6), 0002(Rev.6), 0003(Rev.6), 0004(Rev.6), 0005(Rev.6), 0006(Rev.6), 0007(Rev.6), 0008(Rev.6), 0009(Rev.6), 0010(Rev.6), 0011(Rev.6), 0012(Rev.6), 0013(Rev.6), 0014(Rev.6), 0015(Rev.6), 0016(Rev.6), 0017(Rev.6), 0018(Rev.6), 0019(Rev.6), 0020(Rev.6), 0023(Rev.6), 0024(Rev.6), received 12/03/2024. Drawings 230065-PL-D 0001(Rev.2) and 230065-PL-D 0021(Rev.2), Construction Logistics Plan, Design and Access Statement (05/10/2023), Energy Statement (21/11/2023; Ref. E1381-ES-00), Fire Strategy Report (01/11/2023), Noise Impact Assessment (27/11/2023), Site Photography document (26/01/2024) and Transport Technical Note (22/11/2023; Ref. 23-12136), received 23/01/2024.

Condition : 5 - (a) The development hereby permitted shall be implemented in accordance with the approved Energy Strategy.
(b) Prior to first occupation of any part of the development hereby approved evidence (e.g. photographs, installation contracts and As-Built certificates under the Standard Assessment Procedure/National Calculation Method) shall be submitted to the local planning authority and approved in writing to show that the development has been constructed in accordance with the approved Energy Strategy, and any subsequent approved revisions, and achieved a 103.10% reduction in emissions.
(c) Upon final commencement of operation of any low and zero carbon technologies, suitable devices for the monitoring of the low and zero carbon technologies shall have been installed, and the monitored data shall be submitted automatically to a monitoring web-platform at daily intervals for a period of three years from the point of full operation. The data shall be made available to the local planning authority on request for a period of five years.

Condition : 6 - The development shall not be implemented other than in full compliance with all recommendations and requirements contained within the submitted Noise Assessment Report dated 27 November 2023 by Peak Acoustics Ltd. The measures shall thereafter be retained as such.

Condition : 7 - The floorspace contained within the development hereby permitted shall not be used other than for the purposes specified on the plans hereby approved and ancillary to the main use of the premises and shall not be used for any other purpose.

Condition : 9 - The two electric vehicle charging points detailed in the approved Transport Technical Note shall be installed and all active charging points made operational before the extension / building to which they relate is first occupied or brought into use and shall be permanently retained as such thereafter.

Condition : 10 - Secure covered cycle parking facilities for not less than five bicycles (four long-stay; one short-stay) for the employees of, and visitors to, the development shall be installed in a convenient, readily accessible and secure location, preferably on the south-western corner of the site. The approved facilities shall conform to the current Westtrans West London Cycle Parking Guidance (or such other guidance as shall supersede it) in design and layout and be fully implemented and made available for use before the first occupation of the development or commencement of the approved use as appropriate and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.
